Drama na mejnem prehodu: policist za las ušel najhujšemu
Na hrvaški strani mejnega prehoda je Britanec poskušal povoziti policista.
04 Nov 2019, 15:54 by N. Č.
RUPA/JELŠANE – Policija je prijela britanskega državljana, ki je v soboto zvečer poskušal povoziti policista na hrvaško-slovenskem mejnem prehodu. Prijeli so še dva britanska državljana.Okoli 19.30 so v bližini državne meje Rupa/Jelšane hrvaški policisti pristopili k sumljivemu vozilu, parkiranemu ob cesti, da bi preverili identiteto voznika. 31-letni državljan Veliki Britanije, ki je sedel na voznikovem sedežu, je naglo prižgal motor in zapeljal proti enemu od policistov z »jasnim namenom, da mu onemogoči delo po uradni dolžnosti in povzroči telesne poškodbe«, piše​ index.hr. Policist se je vrgel na tla vstran, tako da ga Britanec ni zadel. Voznika so nato pred vstopom v Slovenijo vendarle zaustavili in ugotovili, da je v kombiju tihotapil več ilegalcev.

Border Crossing Drama: Hair cop escapes the worst
On the Croatian side of the border crossing, a British man tried to overtake a police officer.
04 Nov 2019, 15:54 by N. Č.
RUPA / JELSANE - Police have apprehended a British citizen who was trying to overtake a police officer at the Croatian-Slovenian border crossing on Saturday night. Two more British nationals were apprehended. Around 7.30pm, Croatian police officers approached a suspicious vehicle parked along the road near the Rupa / Jelsana border to check the identity of the driver. A 31-year-old British citizen, sitting in the driver's seat, suddenly started the engine and drove toward one of the officers, with "a clear intention of preventing him from doing his duty and causing bodily harm", writes index.hr. The policeman threw himself to the ground sideways so that the British man did not hit him. The driver was stopped before entering Slovenia and found that he had smuggled several illegals into the van.
